ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: banded is pretty much one step down from plate, that is the best player made armor i think start making the pieces that take 1 sheet of metal at skill 70-75,
ygData.messageBody:
banded is pretty much one step down from plate, that is the best player
made armor i think


start making the pieces that take 1 sheet of metal at skill 70-75, until
then make scalers till 41, then skewers till 70+


At 05:03 PM 5/2/99 -0600, you wrote:

>>>>

<excerpt><fontfamily><param>Arial</param><smaller>Are there advanced
books regarding armor manufacture available? I've got enough skill so
that sharpening weapons and making metal bits is trivial, and want to
know whats next. Also, I've noticed it takes quite a bit of coin to
aquire the ore, water, etc. needed to make armor. In the end, is it more
economical to make my own armor (chain or plate), or to buy it from a
PC?





Thanks in advance!

</smaller></fontfamily>

</excerpt><<<<<<<<
